summary: Four directors capture simple, yet quintessential experiences of a single individual in different periods of his life - childhood, adolescence, adulthood and old age.
cast: Igors Suhoverhovs|Karlis Spravniks|Ints Teterovskis|Liubomiras Laucevicius|Tatjana Jansone-Nazarova|Girts Krumins|Emilija Leiskalne|Jurgis Liepnieks|Armands Reinfelds|Kaspars Rolsteins|Irena Tjunina
director: Directors: Janis Kalejs, Janis Putnins | 2 more credits »
title: Vogelfrei
